name: Homemade Mint Chocolate Chip Ice Cream
author: Erin Reeder
summary: The easiest, most delicious homemade mint chocolate chip ice cream recipe. I use a Cuisinart® ice cream maker but the recipe can be used with other ice cream makers.
directions: Stir heavy cream, sweetened condensed milk, milk, mint extract, vanilla extract, and chocolate chips in a bowl until evenly mixed
Pour mixture into an ice cream maker and freeze according to manufacturer's directions until softly frozen
Transfer ice cream to a lidded container; cover surface with plastic wrap and seal
For best results, ice cream should ripen in the freezer for at least 2 hours to overnight
